label: Provenance
comment: The Provenance class encapsulates details about the origin or source of components or ingredients in a product, including the country of origin and the percentage composition.

datatypeProperties.comment: A ISO 3166-1 code representing the country of origin of the component or ingredient.
A numeric value representing the percentage composition of the component or ingredient in the product.

referencedBy.comment: An array of Provenance objects providing details on the origin of components or ingredients of the product batch.
